colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES BCOM LDAN 'DAS RDO RJE SEMS DPA' YAB YUM LA BSTOD CING THUGS RJE BSKUL BA BYIN RLABS BDUD RTZI'I RGYUN 'BEB CES BYA BA 'DI YANG, GYI NA PA DBYANGS CAN DGA' PA'I BLO GROS KYIS RNAM 'GYUR GYI LO RGYAL ZLA'I TSES BZANG PO GSUM PA'I NYIN RDOR SEMS SGOM BZLAS KYI BCAD BYA'I THUN MTSAMS SU BRIS PA DZA YANTU, ,)
author_simple: DBYANGS CAN DGA' BA'I BLO GROS,
